name: Habiliss Virtual Assistant Services
description:
Habiliss was founded in the year 2009 as a virtual assistant service provider and has served over 6000 clients till date. Our array of services include personal as well as business tasks management, from wake-up calls to buying flowers, meeting schedules to social media management, saving over 70000 hours a year for busy people around the world through our services.
We help enhance productivity and let the client focus on what matters most, essentially enabling them to prioritize ‘First Things First’.
